title: Cloud Architecture Center - Cloud volumes management workflow
abstract:
# Cloud Architecture Center - Cloud volumes management workflow
Last reviewed 2023-04-05 UTC
NetApp Cloud Volumes Service for Google Cloud supports both NFS and SMB protocols. The following diagram illustrates the key tasks for managing cloud volumes that use [NFS](/architecture/partners/netapp-cloud-volumes/creating-nfs-volumes) or [SMB](/architecture/partners/netapp-cloud-volumes/creating-smb-volumes) .
For details of protocol support for each service type, see [Service types](/architecture/partners/netapp-cloud-volumes/service-types) .
content:
